data.name: access_Content
data.value: Centralize your data, simplify it with queries you create, and share it in highly visual reports.

data.name: access_Heading
data.value: Analyze and visualize your Access data

data.name: access_InfoContent
data.value:
Bring your data together

Import large volumes of data from multiple sources into Power BI Desktop. Edit the data before pulling it in or transform and shape the data after it's imported.

Explore your data in fresh ways

Visually explore your data with a variety of customizable reports. Create visualizations by dragging and dropping the fields you want to view. Choose from a variety of charts and graphs to tell your data's story.

Let your data work for you

Once you have created your report, you can share the file like any other file. You can also publish it to the Power BI service where colleagues can interact with it.

data.name: access_InfoHeading
data.value: By connecting to Power BI, you will get all your data in one place, helping you make better decisions, faster than ever

data.name: access_Name
data.value: Access

data.value:

data.name: active_directory_InfoHeading

data.name: acumatica_Content
data.value: Track your opportunity pipeline, monitor progress, and see your projects move in real time with the Acumatica content pack in Power BI.

data.name: acumatica_Heading
data.value: Get real insights from your Acumatica data

data.name: acumatica_InfoContent
data.value:
Get answers you can use

Imagine asking for e-commerce opportunities by time or by amount or by region—or by a combination of factors—and getting the answer in a stunning, interactive visualization. Power BI lets you ask questions in natural language and get the answers from Acumatica in meaningful and powerful forms.

Let the data work for you

You can start seeing an immediate ROI as Power BI and Acumatica help you discover great opportunities and make them immediately actionable.

Explore your data in fresh ways

General data is okay, but specific is better. When you explore your data with the free-form drag-and-drop canvas in Power BI, you can find and highlight the elements that are important to you. Then author reports by choosing from a broad range of modern visualizations.

data.name: acumatica_InfoHeading
data.value: Now you can get real time insights from Acumatica data by connecting through Power BI

data.name: acumatica_Name
data.value: Acumatica

data.name: adobe_analytics_Content
data.value: Track your unique visitors, monitor the average time spent on your site or drill into the details of your page views.

data.name: adobe_analytics_Heading
data.value: Visualize and explore your Adobe Analytics data

data.name: adobe_analytics_InfoContent
data.value:
Explore the metrics important to you

Each visualization on dashboard showcases important metrics about the report. Click on a visualization to access the underlying data. Drill into the data to gain new insights.

Customize your dashboard and reports

Switch into edit mode and while viewing reports and choose the fields you want to monitor. Any of the visualizations from the reports can be pinned to the dashboard.

Refresh on your schedule

Connect to Power BI to bring up the out-of-the-box dashboard. After the initial import, the dashboard and the reports continue to update daily. You can control the refresh schedule to get reports when you need them.

data.name: adobe_analytics_InfoHeading
data.value: With Power BI, you can visualize your data metrics on a single dashboard, helping you make better decisions.

data.name: adobe_analytics_Name
data.value: Adobe Analytics

data.name: analysis_server_Content
data.value: Interact with large volumes of data, create dynamic reports and mashups and gain insights from data visualizations.

data.name: analysis_server_Heading
data.value: Analyze and visualize your SQL Server Analysis Services data

data.name: analysis_server_InfoContent
data.value:
Query and visualize your data

Simply connect your database with Power BI and create dynamic mashups with data and metrics you already have.

Explore your data in fresh ways

Whether you want to combine relational and non-relational data to gain a fuller view or create dynamic reports to uncover new insights, Power BI lets you explore your data in new ways.

Let your data work for you

Pull your data together in one place and quickly gain a 360 degree view of your business. Interact with your data to get answers and create highly visual reports that tell your data's story.

data.name: analysis_server_InfoHeading
data.value: By connecting to Power BI, you will get all your data in one place, making better decisions, faster than ever

data.name: analysis_server_Name
data.value: SQL Server Analysis Services

data.name: appfigures_Content
data.value: Monitor how people are using your app by tracking important statistics. It’s easy with Power BI and the appFigures content pack.

data.name: appfigures_Heading
data.value: Explore and analyze your appFigures data

data.name: appfigures_InfoContent
data.value:
Get clear answers to your app usage questions

Ask a question of your data, such as how many downloads of the app have occurred in a period of time. Or show click activity by region and other parameters.

Explore your data in new ways

You can explore your data by selecting a Power BI tile and drilling into the underlying report. Hovering over an item provides more details. You can easily analyze app sales, downloads and ad statistics.

Put your app data to work for you

Use Power BI to retrieve appFigures data, explore your dataset with modern visualizations, and generate easy-to-read reports to form better insights. The results can be pinned to your dashboard too.

data.name: appfigures_InfoHeading
data.value: Interpret and act on app usage data quickly by connecting to appFigures through your Power BI account

data.name: appfigures_Name
data.value: appFigures

data.name: azure_audit_logs_Content
data.value: Analyze and visualize the information in your Azure Audit logs to discover new insights.

data.name: azure_audit_logs_Heading
data.value: Visualize your Azure Audit logs with Power BI

data.name: azure_audit_logs_InfoContent
data.value:
See all your data in one place

Connect to Power BI to bring up a customizable dashboard. The tiles on the dashboard provide insights on specific operations or events.

Drill down to gain new insights

Click on any visual on the dashboard to bring up a detailed report. Filter the report or add fields that you want to monitor. Pin this view to the dashboard.

Real time data at your fingertips

Once you connect your data to Power BI, the dashboard and underlying reports will refresh daily. Need different timing? You control the refresh schedule on the dataset.

data.name: azure_audit_logs_InfoHeading
data.value: With Power BI, you can visualize the data in your Azure Audit logs, helping you uncover new insights to make better decisions.

data.name: azure_audit_logs_Name
data.value: Azure Audit Logs

data.name: azure_marketplace_Content
data.value: Monitor and grow your Marketplace sales with instant reports and dynamic dashboard on sales, downloads, and installs.

data.name: azure_marketplace_Heading
data.value: Manage your Azure Marketplace sales analytics

data.name: azure_marketplace_InfoContent
data.value:
Interact with your data

Once connected, your data is displayed in the out-of-the-box dashboard made up of several visualizations or tiles. Click on any tile to explore the underlying report. Filter the data or edit which fields to view to see the metrics important to you.

Ask questions, get answers

If you ask to see, "total charges by date," you'll get a stunning, interactive visualization as an answer. With Power BI, you ask questions in natural language and get the right charts and graphs as your answer.

Refresh on your schedule

The dashboard and underlying reports refresh daily. You can control the refresh schedule and modify the frequency on the dataset.

data.name: azure_marketplace_InfoHeading
data.value: By connecting to Power BI, you will get all your data in one place, making better decisions, faster than ever

data.name: azure_marketplace_Name
data.value: Azure Marketplace

data.name: azure_mobile_engagement_Heading
data.value: Monitor your Azure Mobile Engagement data in Power BI

data.name: azure_mobile_engagement_InfoContent
data.value:
Get a global view

When you connect to Power BI, your data is displayed on an out-of-the-box dashboard showcasing important metrics. View metrics on users, session lengths, device counts and more. Click on any tile to access the underlying report.

Explore your data in fresh ways

When you click a tile on the dashboard, you gain access to more data that you can filter or edit. Customize the reports to track the data important to you. Pin your favorite reports to the dashboard.

Refresh on your schedule

Once you connect your data to Power BI, the dashboard and underlying reports will refresh daily. Need different timing? You control the refresh schedule on the dataset.

data.name: azure_mobile_engagement_InfoHeading

data.name: circuit_id_Heading
data.value: Track and monitor your Circuit ID data

data.name: circuit_id_InfoContent
data.value:
See all your data in one place

Connect to Power BI to bring up a curated dashboard and report that shows you insights right from your data. Click any tile to drill down into the data for further information.

Ask questions, get answers

If you make a request such as, "Show me the number of calls by date," you'll get a stunning, interactive visualization as an answer. With Power BI, you ask questions in natural language and get the right charts and graphs as your answer.

Customize your dashboard and reports

Switch into edit mode while viewing reports and choose the fields you want to monitor. Any of the visualizations from the reports can be pinned to the dashboard.

data.name: circuit_id_InfoHeading
data.value: When you connect Circuit ID to Power BI, you can visualize all your data in one place, surfacing new insights so you can make better business decisions.

data.name: comscore_Content
data.value: See how your customers use different media. Find actionable insights to better support your customers.

data.name: comscore_Heading
data.value: Visualize and gain insights into your web analytics data

data.name: comscore_InfoContent
data.value:
Get visuals of all your data on a single dashboard

Once you connect your comScore Digital Analytics account with Power BI, you'll see an out-of-the-box dashboard with tiles visualizing curated metrics including Page Views, Visits and Web Analytics.

Drill down to gain new insights

Click on any visual on the dashboard to bring up a detailed report. Filter the report or add fields that you want to monitor. Pin this view to the dashboard.

Refresh on your schedule

The dashboard and underlying reports refresh daily. You can control how often the data is refreshed.

data.name: comscore_InfoHeading
data.value: By connecting your comScore Digital Analytix data with Power BI, you get visualizations of all your important data, so you can make better business decisions.

data.name: csv_Content
data.value: Quickly create visual reports, analytics, and dashboards from your CSV files, all highly interactive and easy to share.

data.name: csv_Heading
data.value: Get better dashboards and reports for your CSV file data

data.name: csv_InfoContent
data.value:
Analyze and optimize

Get the right data with out-of-the-box analytics reports, dashboards, and KPIs in an easily consumable way. Drill down with filters and detailed reports to gain more actionable insights.

Ask questions. Get answers.

Ask Power BI questions in natural language, like "how many users did we have in November?" An up-to-date chart displays results that you can pin to your dashboard for continued monitoring.

Get the right information to the right people

Pin key visualizations from custom reports to your online dashboards to quickly create a monitoring and reporting resource that’s useful across your entire organization.

data.name: csv_InfoHeading
data.value: By connecting to Power BI, you will get all your data in one place, making better decisions, faster than ever

data.name: csv_Name
data.value: CSV

data.name: facebook_Content
data.value: Get critical insights from your Facebook data including fan counts, post engagement rates, and audience statistics, all on one dashboard.

data.name: facebook_Heading
data.value: Get better dashboards and analytics for Facebook

data.name: facebook_InfoContent
data.value:
Explore and analyze your data more easily

Power BI pulls data from your Facebook account and generates a dashboard and dataset that allow you to explore your data with modern visualizations. Create and share reports easily.

Identify trends quickly

Use your Facebook page analytics in Power BI to spot trends. Find out who your most engaged fans are, which posts have been the most shared, or how trends have changed over time.

No coding required

With Power BI, you don’t need coding knowledge to drill down into your Facebook page data. And automatic data updates help you stay ready to make informed decisions.

data.name: facebook_InfoHeading
data.value: By connecting to Power BI, you will get all your data in one place, making better decisions, faster than ever

data.name: facebook_Name
data.value: Facebook

data.name: github_Content
data.value: Gain insights into your GitHub repository with data around contributions, issues, pull requests and active users.

data.name: github_Title
data.value: GitHub Project Management

data.name: github_InfoContent
data.value:
Get answers to your usage questions

Visualize different types of repository activity in Power BI to gain fresh insights. Ask and get answers about how many commits, who contributes most and at what time of day.

Use GitHub dashboards to explore data in new ways

Take advantage of the Power BI and GitHub dashboard to create modern data visualizations and reports. Use the GitHub tools as provided, or customize reports to highlight the information you care about most.

Put repo data to work for you in GitHub reports

Track usage trends, discover new insights and make your projects more efficient with visualization of repository data. Share your findings with your team and stakeholders in easy-to-read GitHub reports.

data.name: github_InfoHeading
data.value: Use GitHub tools with Power BI to pull in your repo and get usage and performance data in one place

data.name: github_Name
data.value: Github

data.name: google_analytics_Content
data.value: Expand the power of your Google Analytics data. Import and compare data from comparable data sources and aggregators. Develop more compelling visual reports with broader correlations.

data.name: google_analytics_Heading
data.value: Visualize and expand your Google Analytics dashboards with Microsoft Power BI

data.name: google_analytics_InfoContent
data.value:
Get deeper answers to data questions

By amplifying your web data in Power BI, you can uncover hidden relationships or patterns that point to completely new opportunities. Ask different questions of your data to discover innovative marketing ideas and ways to attract new customers.

Explore your data in new ways

Correlate your GA data with external data trends that are influencing the marketplace. You can connect marketing data to data from other parts of the company, or import data from external sources and evaluate your web performance against industry trends.

Expand your business insights

Tracking site visitor behavior is only the beginning of measuring business and brand performance. Put Power BI to work on your Google Analytics data to help take business insights to a higher level.

data.name: google_analytics_InfoHeading
data.value: Power BI + Google Analytics = Custom reporting for your web data

data.name: google_analytics_Name
data.value: Google Analytics

data.name: mailchimp_Content
data.value: Use Power BI and MailChimp integration to identify trends quickly within your campaigns, reports, and among individual subscribers. Track progress and create customized MailChimp reports with modern visualizations.

data.name: mailchimp_Title
data.value: MailChimp Integration

data.name: mailchimp_InfoContent
data.value:
Explore and analyze MailChimp data reports more easily

Power BI pulls data from your MailChimp account and generates a dashboard and dataset that allow you to explore your data with modern visualizations, plus you can create and share reports easily.

Identify trends quickly with MailChimp dashboards

Use MailChimp analytics in Power BI to create reports and spot trends. Find out who your most engaged subscribers are, which places open the most campaigns or how trends have changed over time.

No coding required for MailChimp integration

With Power BI and MailChimp integration, you don’t need coding knowledge to drill down into your reporting. And automatic data updates help you stay on top of data to make informed decisions.

data.name: mailchimp_InfoHeading
data.value: Connect MailChimp and Power BI to create dashboards and easily visualize and monitor your data

data.name: mailchimp_Name
data.value: MailChimp

data.name: mandrill_Content
data.value: Monitor your open rate, clicks and monthly sends. Visualize your campaign growth and uncover new opportunities.

data.name: mandrill_Heading
data.value: Gain insights into your marketing campaigns

data.name: mandrill_InfoContent
data.value:
See all your data in one place

Connect to Power BI to bring up a curated dashboard and reports that shows you insights right from your data. Click any tile to drill down into the data for further information.

Explore your data in fresh ways

Each tile on the dashboard leads to different report pages that include visuals. Hover over any item for more details, or select a particular value to cross filter the with other visuals on the page. Pin your customized reports to the dashboard.

Refresh on your schedule

The dashboard and underlying reports refresh daily once. You can control the refresh schedule and modify the frequency on the dataset.

data.name: mandrill_InfoHeading
data.value: By connecting your Mandrill data to Power BI, you can get highly visual information about your MailChimp campaigns, showcasing actionable insights.

data.name: mandrill_Name
data.value: Mandrill

data.name: marketo_Content
data.value: Bring your data together and monitor it in one place with Marketo reporting. View graphical reports of your data that reside on-premises and in the cloud. Connect and view your data with pre-built Power BI and Marketo dashboards and reports in a matter of minutes.

data.name: marketo_Title
data.value: Marketo Integration

data.name: marketo_InfoContent
data.value:
Ask questions, get answers with Marketo reporting

Ask questions of your Marketo analytics, such as “How many leads do we have by state?” Power BI responds with visual results including maps and graphs that help you see your data.

Use Marketo dashboards to see your data in new ways

The Power BI default report offers useful insights you can use to analyze your lead generation. This report and the Marketo dashboard are customizable to meet your unique needs.

Put your data to work with Marketo integration

Want to know how your marketing programs are doing? Power BI and Marketo reporting can show you the top programs using a variety of metrics and display opportunities where you can optimize.

data.name: marketo_InfoHeading
data.value: Connect your information with Power BI and Marketo integration to gain valuable insights and make better decisions, faster

data.name: marketo_Name
data.value: Marketo

data.name: microsoft_dynamicscrm_Content
data.value: Gain insights into your sales pipeline, discover your most promising leads, and uncover your top opportunites.

data.name: microsoft_dynamicscrm_Heading
data.value: Visualize and analyze your Microsoft Dynamics CRM data

data.name: microsoft_dynamicscrm_InfoContent
data.value:
Visualize your opportunities

Power BI helps you identify opportunities on a single dashboard. Analyze your pipeline or view your sales across a variety of metrics to gain actionable insights.

Gain insights into your customers

Out-of-the-box workbooks provide visuals on key metrics such as customer engagement. Understand case analysis by type, priority and geography. Analyze service performance on number of cases, resolution rate, level of priority and more.

Dive deep into your data

Drill down into each top level chart to understand specifics of metrics such as account, leads, revenue and service. Customize these reports to get the information you need.

data.name: microsoft_dynamicscrm_InfoHeading
data.value: With Power BI, you can get real time insights from your Microsoft Dynamics CRM data

data.name: microsoft_dynamicscrm_Name
data.value: Microsoft Dynamics CRM

data.name: microsoft_dynamics_marketing_Content
data.value: Analyze your lead generation data with visual tools. Make informed decisions with easily consumable analytics reports displayed on a single dashboard.

data.name: microsoft_dynamics_marketing_Heading
data.value: Monitor and explore your Microsoft Dynamics Marketing data

data.name: microsoft_dynamics_marketing_InfoContent
data.value:
Analyze and optimize

Get the right data with out-of-the-box analytics reports, dashboards and KPIs in an easily consumable way. Drill down with filters and detailed reports to gain more actionable insights.

Ask questions. Get answers.

Ask questions in Power BI like "show the number of lead interactions and interaction types over a period as a line." An up-to-date chart displays results that you can pin to your dashboard for continued monitoring.

Customize your reports and dashboard

Start with an empty report and drag-and-drop the fields you want to explore from a comprehensive list. Pin visuals from your custom reports to your dashboards.

data.name: microsoft_dynamics_marketing_InfoHeading
data.value: By connecting Microsoft Dynamics Marketing with Power BI, you see all your lead generation data in one place, letting you make more informed decisions, faster

data.name: microsoft_dynamics_marketing_Name
data.value: Microsoft Dynamics Marketing

data.name: microsoft_dynamics_nav_Content
data.value: Analyze your sales and profit. Track your opportunities pipeline and monitor your profitability metrics to gain new insights.

data.name: microsoft_dynamics_nav_Heading
data.value: Visualize and explore your Microsoft Dynamics NAV data

data.name: microsoft_dynamics_nav_InfoContent
data.value:
Get a global view

When you connect to Power BI, your data is displayed on an out-of-the-box dashboard showcasing important metrics from the dataset. View metrics on sales, monthly goals, revenues vs. expenses and more.

Drill down to gain new insights

Click on any visual on the dashboard to bring up one of seven underlying reports. Filter the report or add fields that you want to monitor. Pin this customized view to the dashboard to continue tracking.

Refresh on your schedule

The dashboard and underlying reports refresh daily. You can control the refresh schedule and modify the frequency on the dataset.

data.name: microsoft_dynamics_nav_InfoHeading
data.value: With Power BI, you can visualize all your Microsoft Dynamics NAV data in one place, uncovering new insights for better business decisions.

data.name: microsoft_dynamics_nav_Name
data.value: Microsoft Dynamics NAV

data.name: mysql_Content
data.value: Centralize your data, simplify it with queries you create, and share it in highly visual reports.

data.name: mysql_Heading
data.value: Analyze and visualize your MySQL data

data.name: mysql_InfoContent
data.value:
Bring your data together

Import large volumes of data from multiple sources into Power BI Desktop. Edit the data before pulling it in or transform and shape the data after it's imported.

Explore your data in fresh ways

Visually explore your data with a variety of customizable reports. Create visualizations by dragging and dropping the fields you want to view. Choose from a variety of charts and graphs to tell your data's story.

Let your data work for you

Once you have created your report, you can share the file like any other file. You can also publish it to the Power BI service where colleagues can interact with it.

data.name: mysql_InfoHeading
data.value: By connecting to Power BI, you will get all your data in one place, helping you make better decisions, faster than ever

data.name: mysql_Name
data.value: MySQL

data.value: Uncover new insights into cash flow, profitability and customers. Share your Quickbooks Online data and monitor the latest income and expenses on the go.

data.name: quickbooks_online_Heading
data.value: Visualize and monitor your Quickbooks Online data

data.name: quickbooks_online_InfoContent
data.value:
Get connected. See your data.

Connect Power BI to your Quickbooks Online account to view the built-in dashboard showing current cash on hand, profit and loss trend, net income, top customers and more.

Interact with your financial reports

Select a chart or graph on your dashboard. Slice your charts to gain insights by fiscal year, or view bestselling products or services.

Customize your views and reports

Prefer a column chart to a bar chart? Choose the chart type you want in the visualizations menu. Want to refresh your data more frequently? Schedule a regular refresh time.

data.name: quickbooks_online_InfoHeading
data.value: By connecting your Quickbooks Online data with Power BI, you’ll get all your data in one place, providing actionable insights

While you can gain a quick overview from the top-level dashboard, you can uncover more insights by exploring each tile in depth.

Analyze custom metrics

If you use custom categories or tags, Power BI makes it really easy to view email delivery breakdowns by different types of activities.

data.name: sql_sentry_Content
data.value: Monitor the SQL Server deployments you track using the SQL Sentry Cloud. Share insights throughout your organization.

data.name: sql_sentry_Heading
data.value: Monitor and visualize your SQL Sentry data

data.name: sql_sentry_InfoContent
data.value:
Get a comprehensive view

When you connect to Power BI, an out-of-the-box dashboard showcases data about the current state of the servers you monitor, including server health, memory usage and downtime. Click on any tile to access the underlying report.

Drill down to gain new insights

Use the tree map to quickly see a view of all the events generated by servers and the distribution across the severity of levels. See which servers are affected the most by each type of event.

Ask questions, get answers

If you ask, "What is my uptime % by date?" you'll get a stunning, interactive visualization as an answer. With Power BI, you ask questions in natural language and get the right charts and graphs as your answer.

data.name: sql_sentry_InfoHeading
data.value: Connect your SQL Sentry data with Power BI to view all of your data in one place.

data.name: sql_sentry_Name
data.value: SQL Sentry

data.name: twilio_Content
data.value: Pull in Twilio call-tracking and message data, monitor your most effective phone numbers, and see your progress week to week with Power BI integration. Share your Twilio dashboard to keep everyone on the same page.

data.name: twilio_Title
data.value: Twilio Integration

data.name: twilio_InfoContent
data.value:
Get answers to Twilio call tracking questions and more

Imagine asking "Which territory had the lowest win ratio last month?" and getting a stunning, interactive visualization as an answer. With Power BI and Twilio integration, you ask questions in natural language and get dashboards featuring the right charts and graphs as your answer.

Use Twilio dashboards to explore data in fresh ways

Visually explore call tracking data and more through a free-form drag-and-drop canvas, a broad range of modern data visualizations, and an easy-to-use Twilio reporting experience.

Let your Twilio data work for you

Want to target your most profitable customers? Power BI integration with Twilio can help you get the greatest ROI by making opportunities easy to discover and act on.

data.name: twilio_InfoHeading
data.value: With Power BI and Twilio integration, you get all your data in one place, so you can make better decisions faster than ever

data.name: twilio_Name
data.value: Twilio

Ask questions, get answers

data.value:

Dive deep into your data

Explore your data in fresh ways

data.name: visual_studio_online_Content
data.value: By connecting Visual Studio Online to Power BI, you can easily visualize data and gain insights into your data that were not previously possible.

data.name: visual_studio_online_Heading
data.value: Gain new insights with Power BI and Visual Studio Online

data.name: visual_studio_online_InfoContent
data.value:
Ask questions, get answers

Imagine asking a question such as “How many pull requests per day do we receive?” and getting a beautifully rendered visualization of your answer in the appropriate format. With the natural language query functionality in Power BI, you can access your data without having to learn a new language.

More displays, more ways

Data from Visual Studio Online is a natural fit for the complex nature of development data. With Power BI, you can create customized reports that allow information to be displayed in many different ways – giving you more options for reporting and presenting your data.

Get in touch with your data

The Power BI web experience is fully touch optimized, so you can easily shift around Commits, graphs and other visuals on your touchscreen. Be productive while having fun with your data.

data.name: visual_studio_online_InfoHeading
data.value: Visualize your data with Power BI

data.name: visual_studio_online_Name
data.value: Visual Studio Online

Refresh on your schedule

data.value: Get better dashboards and reports for your XML file data

data.name: xml_InfoContent
data.value:
Analyze and optimize

Get the right data with out-of-the-box analytics reports, dashboards, and KPIs in an easily consumable way. Drill down with filters and detailed reports to gain more actionable insights.

Ask questions. Get answers.

Ask Power BI questions in natural language, like "how many users did we have in November?" An up-to-date chart displays results that you can pin to your dashboard for continued monitoring.

Get the right information to the right people

Pin key visualizations from custom reports to your online dashboards to quickly create a monitoring and reporting resource that’s useful across your entire organization.

data.name: xml_InfoHeading
data.value: By connecting to Power BI, you will get all your data in one place, making better decisions, faster than ever

data.name: xml_Name
data.value: XML

data.name: zendesk_Content
data.value: Connecting Zendesk and Power BI gives you an even easier way to explore and monitor your Zendesk data. Plus with the dashboard and starter set of reports in the out of box content pack, you can be productive immediately.

data.name: zendesk_Heading
data.value: Get real insights from your Zendesk data

data.name: zendesk_InfoContent
data.value:
Your dashboard, your way

With Power BI and Zendesk, you can access critical information about your tickets, agents, organizations, and more through a customizable dashboard. You choose the data types and timeline; Power BI and Zendesk do the rest.

Pin critical insights

Want to ensure a data point is easily accessible? Use the pinning customization option to add it to your dashboard.

Your questions answered

Have questions about overall ticket sales or a specific agent’s sales for last Thursday? You can get the answers you need through the question box on the dashboard.

data.name: zendesk_InfoHeading
data.value: Get more from your Zendesk data by connecting through Power BI

data.name: zendesk_Name
data.value: Zendesk

data.name: default_InfoContent
data.value:
Analyze and optimize

Get the right data with out-of-the-box analytics reports, dashboards, and KPIs in an easily consumable way. Drill down with filters and detailed reports to gain more actionable insights.

Ask questions. Get answers.

Ask Power BI questions in natural language, like "how many users did we have in November?" An up-to-date chart displays results that you can pin to your dashboard for continued monitoring.

Get the right information to the right people

Pin key visualizations from custom reports to your online dashboards to quickly create a monitoring and reporting resource that’s useful across your entire organization.

data.name: default_InfoHeading
data.value: By connecting to Power BI, you will get all your data in one place, making better decisions, faster than ever

data.name: default_Heading
data.value: Get better dashboards and reports for your data

data.name: xero_Content
data.value: With Power BI you can develop compelling visual reports that bring together your Xero accounting data and your other data sources in one place. Obtain a 360° view of your business in minutes with easy to use, drag and drop, pre-built dashboards and reports.

data.name: xero_Heading
data.value: Visualize and gain powerful insights into your accounting data instantly

data.name: xero_InfoContent
data.value:
Instantly visualize and analyze Your Xero Data

Take advantage of the Power BI and Xero dashboard to create modern data visualizations and reports. Power BI empowers small businesses and their advisors to drill down into a specific business metrics like cash position and automatically generate “Quick Insights” in seconds.

Compare and contrast critical data across all your apps

Compare your Xero accounting data side by side, against other critical applications such as Microsoft Dynamics CRM, Mailchimp, Insightly, Google Analytics, Zendesk and Stripe.

Share seamlessly

Build new dashboards with natural language selection. Share and store visually impactful dashboards and reports safely with colleagues - anytime, anywhere.

data.name: xero_InfoHeading
data.value: Use Xero tools with Power BI to gain powerful insights into your accounting data - instantly, beautifully, and all in one place

data.name: xero_Name
data.value: Xero
